description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              - Make drawing, installation, testing and commissioning, fitting-out, maintenance and implementation services for HVAC such as: ventilation, air-conditioning, heating; Plumbing; Fire Fighting; and Utilities systems at factory, etc..
              
              - Set-up and control work schedule of staff and sub-contractor at site.
              
              - Assist in making estimates, technical drawing, purchases related to work implementation.
              
              - Check & verify all technical reports (maintenance, services, troubleshooting).
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              - Graduated from Construction University or Polytechnic University, Communications & Transport University; Industrial University major in thermo-refrigeration or HVAC systems (heating, ventilation and air-conditioning) or Environment…
              
              - Good command of computer skills such as: AutoCAD, Excel & Words.
              
              - Able to read, understand all technical document and communicate in English.
              
              - Willing to work in other provinces.
              

              Profile should include:
              
              Application letter in English
              
              Bachelor and related certificates.
              
              Summary of working experience and qualifications.
              
              Notarized CV
              
              2 portraits (3*4)
              

              05 HVAC Engineers (>2 years of Experience)
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
phuc-loi:
Các Phúc Lợi Dành Cho Bạn
